Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Yes, this is a game! If gaining my fortune and leaving the island is your goal, then there are only two ways to achieve it!
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, this is a game! If gaining my fortune and leaving the island is your goal, then there are only two ways to achieve it!"
PC Japanese (JP): そう、これはゲームだ！　お前たちにとって、我が財産を得て島を出ることがゴールならば、それを達する方法は２つしかない！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そう、これはゲームだ！　お前たちにとって、我が財産を得て島を出ることがゴールならば、それを達する方法は２つしかない！」
Russian (RU): "Да это игра! Если ваша цель добыть моё богатство и покинуть этот остров, то у вас есть лишь два пути, чтобы добиться этого!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, isto é um jogo! Se obter minha fortuna e deixar a ilha é o objetivo de vocês, então há apenas dois meios de alcançar isto!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对，这是场游戏！对你们来说，终点是得到吾之财产，离开这个岛的话，那么要做到此，就只有两个方法！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sì, questo è un gioco! Se ottenere la mia fortuna e lasciare l'isola è il vostro obiettivo, allora ci sono solo due modi per raggiungerlo!

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): Will you escape being chosen as one of the 13 sacrifices and spectacularly survive, by finally solving the riddle of the epitaph and stopping the ceremony, ...or will you kill me?! ...And thereby stop this ceremony. Those are your only two options!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Successfully survive being chosen as one of the thirteen sacrifices, and stop the ritual by finally solving the riddle of the epitaph, ......or kill me! And stop the ritual in that manner. Those are the only two ways!!"
PC Japanese (JP): １３人の生贄から逃れ見事生き残り、今さらながら碑文の謎を解いて儀式を止めてみせるか、……私を殺しッ！　この儀式を止めてみせるか。この２つしかない！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「１３人の生贄から逃れ見事生き残り、今さらながら碑文の謎を解いて儀式を止めてみせるか、……私を殺しッ！　この儀式を止めてみせるか。この２つしかない！！」
Russian (RU): "Удастся ли вам избежать участи стать одной из 13 жертв, чудом выжить и, наконец, разгадать загадку эпитафии и остановить ритуал, либо же убить меня! И тем самым остановить этот ритуал. Есть лишь два пути!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Terem sucesso sobrevivendo para não serem escolhidos como um dos treze sacrifícios e interrompendo o ritual ao resolverem o enigma do epitáfio, ......ou me matando! Será que serão capazes de interromper este ritual? Essas são as duas únicas formas de fazer isso!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「要么，就去漂亮地逃过十三活祭活下来，事到如今才去解开碑文之谜，阻止仪式，……要么，就杀了我！以此来阻止这场仪式。只有这两条路！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eviterete di essere scelti come uno dei 13 sacrifici e sopravvivere in una maniera spettacolare, risolvendo finalmente l'enigma dell'epigrafe e fermando la cerimonia... o mi ucciderete! E quindi fermerete questa cerimonia. Ci sono solo questi due modi!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): Dad's free to start up any weird ceremony he wants to revive the witch he loves. That's his hobby. But getting wrapped up in that...ahaha...and being made into a human sacrifice is a little more than I can handle."
Umineko Project (UP): "You're free to start up whatever weird ritual you want to revive the witch you love. That's your hobby, after all. But dragging me into all that, and making me into......hahaha, a sacrifice, is just not gonna happen."

Russian (RU): "Отец может начать любой странный ритуал, какой ему захочется, чтобы оживить свою ненаглядную ведьму. Так пускай развлекается. Но оказаться вовлечённым в это... аха‐ха‐ха... и выступать в качестве жертвы — это немного выше моих сил."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você é livre para começar qualquer ritual estranho que você queira para reviver sua amada bruxa. Afinal, esse é o seu único passatempo. Mas me envolver nisso, e ainda me transformar em um......hahaha, um sacrifício, não, não vai acontecer."

Umineko Project (UP): "What are you talking about, Aneki?! You think I'm gonna sit here nodding my head at this, are you nuts?!"

Steam (ST): Was the "ceremony" Kinzo had mentioned literally something disturbing, or was it some kind of test to choose the Successor?
Umineko Project (UP): Was the "ritual" Kinzo had mentioned literally the frightening thing it seemed to be, or was it some kind of test to choose his successor?

Steam (ST): It seemed that Rudolf had taken it literally, but Eva apparently still believed that it was something like a test or examination to find a proper Successor.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that Rudolf had taken it at its disturbing face value, but Eva apparently still believed that it was something like a trial, or examination, to find the proper next head.
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫は言葉通りの物騒なものとして受け取ったようだが、絵羽はそれでも、これは次期当主を見極めるための、試練や審査のようなものだと信じているようだった。
Russian (RU): Рудольф, похоже, воспринял слова Кинзо буквально, но Ева всё ещё верила, что это было нечто вроде испытания или проверки для определения надлежащего следующего главы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que Rudolf havia assumido aquela conversa perturbadora de forma literal, mas Eva aparentava ainda acreditar que aquilo era algum tipo de provação ou exame, para decidir o próximo chefe da família.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然留弗夫將此照字面意思理解成了駭人的儀式，但繪羽貌似還相信著，這是為了看清誰適合當下任當主的，考驗或審查之類的玩意兒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然留弗夫将此照字面意思理解成了骇人的仪式，但绘羽貌似还相信着，这是为了看清谁适合当下任当主的，考验或审查之类的玩意儿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che Rudolf l'avesse presa alla lettera, ma Eva apparentemente credeva ancora che fosse qualcosa come un test o esame... per trovare il prossimo capofamiglia adatto.

Steam (ST): But Kinzo responded with a clear smile.
Umineko Project (UP): But Kinzo's response to this was clear.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas a resposta de Kinzo foi clara.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，金藏對此給予了明快的回答。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，金藏对此给予了明快的回答。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma Kinzo rispose loro con un chiaro sorriso.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Well then, that is all I have to say. Nooo objections or opinions are necessary from you...!!
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, that is all I have to say. Nooo objections or viewpoints are necessary...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「さて、私からの話は以上だ。異議も意見もなァんにも必要はなぁい…！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さて、私からの話は以上だ。異議も意見もなァんにも必要はなぁい…！！」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Bene allora, questo è tutto ciò che avevo da dire. Nessunaaaa obiezione o punto di vista è necessario...!!

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): I will simply awaken from my dream of having four unsuccessful children. To all of you, what will occur now before your very eyes may seem like a dream, an illusion, something that couldn't conceivably be of this world, and a world that defies understanding."
Umineko Project (UP): "I will simply awaken from my dream in which I have four failures for children. To all of you, what will occur now before your very eyes will no doubt seem like a dream, an illusion, an unearthly world that defies understanding."
PC Japanese (JP): ４人の不出来なる息子たちがいたという私の夢が覚めるだけの話なのだ。お前たちにとって、これより目の前で起こることはまさに夢、幻、あるいはこの世のものと思えぬ理解に及ばぬ世界だろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「４人の不出来なる息子たちがいたという私の夢が覚めるだけの話なのだ。お前たちにとって、これより目の前で起こることはまさに夢、幻、あるいはこの世のものと思えぬ理解に及ばぬ世界だろう」
Russian (RU): "Я просто очнусь ото сна, в котором у меня есть никчёмные неудачливые дети. То, что сейчас произойдёт у вас перед глазами, может показаться вам сном, иллюзией, чем‐то не принадлежащим к этому миру и миром, отрицающим понимание и познание."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu simplesmente irei despertar do sonho no qual tive quatro filhos fracassados. Para todos vocês, o que vai ocorrer diante de seus olhos certamente irá parecer um sonho, uma ilusão, um mundo sobrenatural que desafia a compreensão."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「也就僅僅是，我會從有四個廢柴兒女的夢中醒來罷了。對你們來說，接下來要在你們眼前發生的正是夢境、幻覺，又或許會是不屬於這個世界的無法理解的世界吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「也就仅仅是，我会从有四个废柴儿女的梦中醒来罢了。对你们来说，接下来要在你们眼前发生的正是梦境、幻觉，又或许会是不属于这个世界的无法理解的世界吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Semplicemente mi sveglierò dal mio sogno di avere quattro figli falliti. Per tutti voi, quello che accadrà ora potrà sembrare un sogno, un illusione, qualcosa che non può essere assolutamente di questo mondo, e un mondo che sfida la comprensione.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "But that itself is my reality!! Now, I will finally awaken from the shallow, useless dream that all of you are!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "But that itself is my reality!! Now, I will finally awaken from the fleeting and useless dream that all of you are!!"
PC Japanese (JP): しかしそれこそが我が現実！！　お前たちという出来の悪き浅い夢は今こそようやく覚めるのだッ！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しかしそれこそが我が現実！！　お前たちという出来の悪き浅い夢は今こそようやく覚めるのだッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Но это и есть сама реальность! Теперь‐то я, наконец, проснусь от никчёмного, бесполезного сна, коим все вы являетесь!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mas isto em si é a minha realidade!! Agora, eu finalmente despertarei deste efêmero e inútil sonho onde todos vocês aparecem!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，這即是吾之真實！！我總算要於此刻，從你們這個糟透了的淺夢中醒來了！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，这即是吾之真实！！我总算要于此刻，从你们这个糟透了的浅梦中醒来了！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma questa è proprio la mia realtà!! Ora, finalmente mi sveglierò dal vuoto, inutile sogno che tutti voi siete!!

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Come, the game has already begun, see? With this many of you here, I can take lives starting with anyone...!!
Umineko Project (UP): "Come, the game has already begun! With this many of you here, I hardly know whose life I should take first...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): さぁ、もうゲームは始まっているぞ？　これだけいては、誰から命を奪えばいいものやら…！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さぁ、もうゲームは始まっているぞ？　これだけいては、誰から命を奪えばいいものやら…！！」

Umineko Project (UP): The golden arrow that had been readied there was fired off without any hesitation, flew around the room leaving haphazard gold trails everywhere, .........and from among those sitting at the table of the family conference, it chose Natsuhi, and pulverized the left half of her face.
PC Japanese (JP): そこに構えられた黄金の矢は何の躊躇いもなく放たれ、室内をでたらめな黄金の軌跡を残しながら飛び回り、………親族会議のテーブルに座した一同の中から、夏妃を選び、その顔面の左半分を粉砕した。
Russian (RU): Золотая стрела, наложенная на тетиву и пущенная без всяких колебаний, пролетела по комнате, повсюду за собой оставляя след золотого изгиба... И среди всех, сидящих за столом, избрала Нацухи, разнеся ей левую половину лица.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O arco dourado prontamente disparou sem qualquer hesitação, voando ao redor da sala, deixando para trás fortuitas trilhas douradas por todo o local, .........e dentre aqueles sentados à mesa de jantar da conferência familiar, escolheu Natsuhi, pulverizando a parte esquerda de sua face.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在弦上的黃金之箭被毫不猶豫地射出，在室內留下了雜亂無章的黃金軌跡，飛來飛去，………然後它於坐在親族會議桌邊的眾人中，選中了夏妃，粉碎了她的左半張臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在弦上的黄金之箭被毫不犹豫地射出，在室内留下了杂乱无章的黄金轨迹，飞来飞去，………然后它于坐在亲族会议桌边的众人中，选中了夏妃，粉碎了她的左半张脸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La freccia dorata che era stata preparata fu scoccata senza alcuna esitazione, volteggiò per la stanza lasciando casuali loci dorati dappertutto... e scelse Natsuhi tra quelli seduti al tavolo della conferenza di famiglia, polverizzando la metà sinistra del suo volto.

Steam (ST): Flesh and deep-red blood scattered around, leaving massive red spatter marks on the relatives' faces and the pure white tablecloth.
Umineko Project (UP): Flesh and deep‐red blood splattered all around, leaving a massive amount of deep‐red spatter marks on the relatives' faces and the pure white tablecloth.
PC Japanese (JP): 肉片と真っ赤な血飛沫が辺りに撒き散らされ、親族たちの顔と真っ白なテーブルクロスに真っ赤な飛沫を大量に残す。
Russian (RU): Повсюду разлетелись плоть и тёмно красная кровь, оставив множество тёмно красных капельных отметин на лицах родственников и белоснежной скатерти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Carne e sangue fresco, de vermelhidão profunda, se espalharam ao redor, deixando intensas quantias de respingos vermelhos nos rostos dos irmãos e também na alva toalha de mesa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 肉片與紅色的血沫向四周飛濺開來，在親族們的臉上與雪白的桌布上留下了大量鮮紅的污跡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 肉片与红色的血沫向四周飞溅开来，在亲族们的脸上与雪白的桌布上留下了大量鲜红的污迹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Carne e sangue rosso scuro si dispersero tutt'attorno, lasciando una grande quantità di schizzi di sangue sul volto dei parenti e sulla tovaglia di un bianco candido.

Steam (ST): ...Silence fell.
Umineko Project (UP): ......There was silence.
PC Japanese (JP): シン、……としていた。
Russian (RU): ......Последовала тишина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鴉雀無聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 鸦雀无声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ci fu silenzio.

Steam (ST): Despite the massive number of deep-red spots left on the tablecloth, ......no one could understand why Natsuhi's head was half smashed, nor why she was hanging her head as though dozing while still sitting, ......and they watched on in silence.
Umineko Project (UP): Despite the massive number of deep‐red blotches left on the tablecloth, even still, .........no one could understand why Natsuhi's head was half smashed, nor why she was hanging her head as though she had dozed off in her chair, .........and they watched these events in silence.
PC Japanese (JP): 一同は、テーブルクロスに真っ赤な斑が大量に残されても、なお、この異常な、………夏妃が頭部を半壊させて、腰掛けたまま居眠りをするように頭を垂れるのを、………何が起こったのか理解できずに、沈黙して見守っていた。
Russian (RU): И хотя на скатерти осталось много‐много тёмно красных пятен, никто не мог понять ни зачем Нацухи разнесли полголовы, ни почему она повесила голову, словно задремав сидя. И они сидели и смотрели в тишине.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Apesar do grande número de manchas deixadas na toalha de mesa, ainda assim, .........ninguém era capaz de compreender o motivo pelo qual a cabeça de Natsuhi havia sido esmagada, nem o porquê de sua cabeça estar pendurada, como se ela estivesse apenas tirando um cochilo na cadeira, .........e continuaram apenas a observar aquilo em silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 儘管桌布上留下了一大片紅斑，但大家還是沒能搞懂，這異常的，………夏妃頭部半毀，如坐著打瞌睡般地垂下了頭，………是怎麼一回事，只好默默地看著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 尽管桌布上留下了一大片红斑，但大家还是没能搞懂，这异常的，………夏妃头部半毁，如坐着打瞌睡般地垂下了头，………是怎么一回事，只好默默地看着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nonostante ci fu un gran numero di macchie rosse rimaste sulla tovaglia... nessuno riusciva a capire perché la testa di Natsuhi era stata mezza distrutta, e nemmeno perché stava chinando il capo come se stesse dormendo da seduta... e osservarono in silenzio.

Steam (ST): ...Those sitting on Natsuhi's right-hand side were silent for a relatively long time, but those sitting to her left were not.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Those sitting on the right‐hand side from Natsuhi were silent for a relatively long time, but those sitting on her left were not.
PC Japanese (JP): ……夏妃より右側に座っていた者たちは比較的長く沈黙していたが、左側に座っていた者たちはそうはいかなかった。
Russian (RU): ......Сидящие справа от Нацухи сохраняли молчание относительно долгое время, иное дело сидящие слева.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Aqueles sentados ao lado direito de Natsuhi ficaram em silêncio por um tempo relativamente longo, já aquelas sentados à sua esquerda, não.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……相較而言，坐在夏妃右側的人保持了一段較長的沉默，不過坐在左側的人就並非如此了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……相较而言，坐在夏妃右侧的人保持了一段较长的沉默，不过坐在左侧的人就并非如此了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quelli seduti al lato destro di Natsuhi rimasero in silenzio per un periodo relativamente lungo, ma quelli seduti alla sua sinistra no.

Steam (ST): ...Because the people sitting on that side had been shown how her head had been smashed open like a watermelon or a pomegranate... and could even see inside her...
Umineko Project (UP): ......Because the people sitting on that side...had been shown how her head had been smashed open like a watermelon or a pomegranate, and could even see inside her......
PC Japanese (JP): ……そちら側に座っていた人々は、彼女の頭部が叩き割られた西瓜か石榴のようになっている、その内側まで見せ付けられていたからだ……。
Russian (RU): ......Поскольку люди, сидящие на той стороне увидели, как её голову раскололи как арбуз или гранат, и даже могли заглянуть внутрь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Porque as pessoas sentadas daquele lado...presenciaram sua cabeça sendo esmagada e aberta, como uma melânica, ou quiçá uma romã, e podiam até mesmo ver seu interior......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這是因為，坐在左側的人，清清楚楚地看到了，猶如被劈開的西瓜、石榴般，完全暴露出內側的她的頭……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这是因为，坐在左侧的人，清清楚楚地看到了，犹如被劈开的西瓜、石榴般，完全暴露出内侧的她的头……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché le persone sedute da quella parte vedevano che la sua testa era stata fracassata come un'anguria o una melagrana, e potevano persino vedere dentro lei...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Russian (RU): "На... цухи..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Na... tsuhi..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "...One down. Natsuhi, is it? A luckless woman to the end. ...Next!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......That's one. Natsuhi, I see. A luckless woman to the end. ......Next!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……まずは１人。夏妃か、最後まで運のない女だ。……次ッ！」
Russian (RU): "......Первая. Нацухи, значит? Невезучая женщина до самого конца. ......Следующий!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Foi a primeira. A Natsuhi, é? Uma mulher sem sorte até o fim de sua vida. ......Próximo!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……先是一人。夏妃麼，直到最後，都是個沒運氣的女人呢。……繼續！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……先是一人。夏妃么，直到最后，都是个没运气的女人呢。……继续！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... La prima. È stata Natsuhi? Una donna sfortunata fino alla fine. ... Il prossimo!"

Speaker: Chiester00
Steam (ST): "00, Firing."
Umineko Project (UP): "00, firing."
Russian (RU): "00, открываю огонь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "00, disparando."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "00, Fuoco."

Steam (ST): After scratching the empty air in the same way and readying her bow, 00 fired as well.
Umineko Project (UP): In the same way, 00 scratched the empty air to ready her bow, and fired.
PC Japanese (JP): ００も同じように虚空を掻いて黄金の弓を構えると、放つ。
Russian (RU): Точно так же почесав воздух и подготовив свой лук, 00 тоже сделала выстрел.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Da mesma forma, 00 arranhou o vazio do ar para preparar seu arco e disparou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 00 也同樣地臨空一彎指，拉開黃金之弓，射出箭去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 00 也同样地临空一弯指，拉开黄金之弓，射出箭去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver graffiato l'aria allo stesso modo e aver preparato l'arco, anche 00 sparò.

Steam (ST): After it flew around and around at high speeds like the golden arrow 410 had released, drawing a convoluted curve in the same manner, ...it smashed half of Rudolf's head in the same way as he looked at Natsuhi in shock, killing him instantly.
Umineko Project (UP): Just like the golden arrow 410 had released, it flew around and around at high speeds, drawing a convoluted trail, after which, ......as he looked at Natsuhi in shock, it smashed half of Rudolf's head in the same way, killing him instantly.
PC Japanese (JP): ４１０の放った黄金の矢同様、でたらめな軌跡を描いて室内をぐるぐると高速で飛びまわった後、……夏妃を呆然と見ていた、留弗夫を、同じように頭部を半壊させて即死させた。
Russian (RU): Полетав тут и там на огромной скорости, как и золотая стрела, пущенная 410, рисуя округлые дуги в той же манере... Она точно так же разнесла Рудольфу полголовы, пока тот в шоке смотрел на Нацухи, убив того на месте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim como a flecha dourada que 410 havia acabado de disparar, ela voou em círculos em alta velocidade, desenhando uma trilha circinal, enquanto, ......como se olhasse traumatizado para Natsuhi, Rudolf teve parte de sua cabeça esmagada da mesma forma, matando‐o instantaneamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與 410 放出的黃金之箭一樣，描繪下亂七八糟的軌跡，轉著圈地在室內高速亂飛後，……以同樣的粉碎半個腦袋的殺法，當即結果了呆呆看著夏妃的留弗夫的性命。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与 410 放出的黄金之箭一样，描绘下乱七八糟的轨迹，转着圈地在室内高速乱飞后，……以同样的粉碎半个脑袋的杀法，当即结果了呆呆看着夏妃的留弗夫的性命。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver volato intorno e intorno ad alta velocità come la freccia dorata che 410 aveva sparato, disegnando un locus attorcigliato alla stessa maniera... distrusse metà della testa di Rudolf nello stesso modo per cui lui osservava Natsuhi shockato, uccidendolo istantaneamente.

Steam (ST): This time, everyone managed to avoid freezing up mentally. They realized that a fearsome murder had started playing out right in front of them, just as Kinzo had said.
Umineko Project (UP): This time, everyone did not stop thinking altogether. They realized that a terrible murder had been carried out right in front of them according to Kinzo's words.
PC Japanese (JP): 今度はみんな、思考停止には陥らなかった。恐るべき殺人が、金蔵の言葉通りに目の前で実行され出したことを理解する。
Russian (RU): На этот раз все не перестали думать одновременно. До них дошло, что прямо перед ними творится описанное Кинзо жуткое убийство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desta vez, seus pensamentos não foram completamente interrompidos. Eles perceberam que um terrível assassinato havia ocorrido bem diante de seus olhos, assim como Kinzo havia proferido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這次大家並沒有陷入思考停止。明白了可怕的殺人正在照金藏的話，於自己的眼前得到實施。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这次大家并没有陷入思考停止。明白了可怕的杀人正在照金藏的话，于自己的眼前得到实施。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa volta, tutti non smisero di pensare completamente. Capirono che uno spaventoso assassino stava uccidendo secondo le parole di Kinzo proprio di fronte a loro.

Steam (ST): And they realized that Kinzo would probably kill even more...!
Umineko Project (UP): And they understood that Kinzo would probably kill again......!
PC Japanese (JP): そして、金蔵はさらに殺すだろうことを理解する……！
Russian (RU): И они осознали, что Кинзо обязательно убьёт опять!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles entendiam que Kinzo possivelmente iria continuar a matar......!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且，金藏還會繼續殺下去……！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且，金藏还会继续杀下去……！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E capirono che Kinzo probabilmente avrebbe ucciso ancora...!

Steam (ST): Shrill screams burst out.
Umineko Project (UP): Shrill screams burst out.

Russian (RU): Вырвались пронзительные крики.

Steam (ST): Even so, they didn't know what to do. So they could only keep screaming and flapping their wide-open mouths like goldfish...
Umineko Project (UP): Even now, they still didn't know what to do.{n}So they could only keep screaming and flapping their wide‐open mouths like goldfish......
PC Japanese (JP): それでもなお、彼らはどうすればいいかわからなかった。だから、悲鳴をほとばしらせたままに口を大きく開けて、金魚のようにぱくぱくとさせ続けるしかなかった……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それでもなお、彼らはどうすればいいかわからなかった。{n}だから、悲鳴をほとばしらせたままに口を大きく開けて、金魚のようにぱくぱくとさせ続けるしかなかった……。
Russian (RU): Но даже так, они всё равно не знали, что делать.{n}Поэтому они могли лишь кричать, да разевать рот как золотые рыбки...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Agora, eles sequer sabiam o que fazer.{n}Por isso só conseguiram continuar a gritar e se debater, abrindo e fechando suas bocas como um peixinho dourado fora d'água......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過即便都這樣了，他們還是不知道該怎麼辦。{n}所以，他們只能讓那隨著慘叫大張的嘴巴，不停地如金魚般一張一合……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过即便都这样了，他们还是不知道该怎么办。{n}所以，他们只能让那随着惨叫大张的嘴巴，不停地如金鱼般一张一合……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche così, non sapevano cosa fare. Perciò poterono solo urlare e aprire e chiudere le loro bocche come pesci rossi...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "...F-Father, ...what do you think you're doing...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "F‐......Father......what do you think you're doing......?"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "P‐......Pai......o que pensa que está fazendo......?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「爸、……爸爸……，您这是什么意思……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "P... Padre... che cosa stai facendo...?"

Steam (ST): "...Y-You fool!! Run now!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "...Y‐you dolt!! Hurry up and run!!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...S‐Sua idiota!! Apresse‐se e fuja!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…呆、呆子！！快跑呐！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... S-Stupida!! Scappa ora!!"

Steam (ST): As Eva asked Kinzo that in total shock, Hideyoshi, who had come to his senses faster than anyone else and risen to his feet, pulled at her arm from behind.
Umineko Project (UP): As Eva asked Kinzo that in total shock, Hideyoshi, who had come to his senses and risen from his chair faster than anyone else, pulled at her arm from behind.
PC Japanese (JP): 呆然としながら、金蔵にそう問い掛ける絵羽を、誰よりもいち早く正気に戻って立ち上がった秀吉が、後から腕を掴み引っ張る。
Russian (RU): Пока глубоко шокированная Ева задавала Кинзо этот вопрос, Хидэёши, пришедший в себя быстрее остальных, потянул её за руку сзади.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto Eva questionava Kinzo, completamente chocada, Hideyoshi retomou seus sentidos e levantou de sua cadeira mais rápido que os demais, puxando‐a pelo braço.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 比誰都要快地回過神來猛然起立的秀吉，從身後一把抓住了，目瞪口呆地向金藏問了那句話的繪羽的胳膊，要拉她走。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 比谁都要快地回过神来猛然起立的秀吉，从身后一把抓住了，目瞪口呆地向金藏问了那句话的绘羽的胳膊，要拉她走。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre Eva chiedeva ciò a Kinzo nello shock più totale, Hideyoshi, che era tornato ai suoi sensi più veloce di chiunque altro, tirò il suo braccio da dietro.

Steam (ST): However, merciless fate's choice for the third sacrifice... ...was Hideyoshi.
Umineko Project (UP): However, merciless fate's choice for the third sacrifice.........was Hideyoshi.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、無慈悲なる運命は３人目の生贄に、………秀吉を選ぶ。
Russian (RU): Однако по безжалостному выбору судьбы третьей жертвой... оказался Хидэёши.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Contudo, o impiedoso destino logo escolheu o terceiro sacrifício.........ele foi Hideyoshi.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，無情的命運選中了秀吉，………成為第三名活祭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，无情的命运选中了秀吉，………成为第三名活祭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, la scelta del fato crudele per il terzo sacrificio... fu Hideyoshi.

Steam (ST): Just like the two before him, half of Hideyoshi's head was neatly smashed, ...and the right side of his head, which had happened to be facing that direction at the time, ...had been blown away with its contents exposed like a watermelon or a pomegranate.
Umineko Project (UP): Just like the two before him, half of Hideyoshi's head was neatly smashed, ......and the right side of his head, which happened to be facing that direction at the time, ......was blown away, chunks of its contents thrown everywhere like a watermelon or a pomegranate.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉の頭部もまた、それまでの２人と同じく綺麗に半分、……その時、たまたま向けていた右側側頭部が、……西瓜か石榴のように中身をぶちまけて吹き飛ばされた。
Russian (RU): И как двоим до него, золотая стрела аккуратно разнесла ему полголовы... И правую сторону его лица, повернутую в том направлении в тот момент, разнесло, разбрызгав содержимое, словно это был арбуз или гранат.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim como os dois, parte da cabeça de Hideyoshi foi nitidamente esmagada, ......e o lado direito de sua cabeça, que estava virado para aqueles atrás dele, ......explodiu — pedaços de seu interior voaram sobre todos como uma romã sendo esmagada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 秀吉的頭部也與之前兩人一樣，只剩下了正好一半，……那時碰巧正對著黃金箭的右側頭部，……如被踩爆的西瓜、石榴般，噴濺出血肉地炸沒了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 秀吉的头部也与之前两人一样，只剩下了正好一半，……那时碰巧正对着黄金箭的右侧头部，……如被踩爆的西瓜、石榴般，喷溅出血肉地炸没了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Proprio come i due prima di lui, metà della testa di Hideyoshi fu concisamente distrutta... e la parte sinistra del suo capo, che era volta in quella direzione... era stata spazzata via con il suo contenuto esposto come un'anguria o una melagrana.

Steam (ST): So, still holding Eva, ...Hideyoshi slumped backwards and fell down.
Umineko Project (UP): So, still holding Eva, ......Hideyoshi toppled backwards and fell down.
PC Japanese (JP): だから秀吉は、絵羽を掴んだまま、……ぐらりと後へ仰け反って倒れる。
Russian (RU): И, всё ещё держа руку Евы... Хидэёши отступил назад и повалился на пол.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Consequentemente, ainda segurando a mão de Eva, ......Hideyoshi tombou para trás e caiu no chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，秀吉是攥著繪羽，……身子一晃，向後仰面倒地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，秀吉是攥着绘羽，……身子一晃，向后仰面倒地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò, tenendo ancora Eva... Hideyoshi si accasciò all'indietro e cadde a terra.

Steam (ST): Still held by her beloved husband, Eva fell over backwards with him.
Umineko Project (UP): Still held by her beloved husband, Eva fell over backwards with him.
PC Japanese (JP): 絵羽は最愛の夫に抱かれたまま、一緒に後へ転げて倒れる。
Russian (RU): Будучи всё ещё удерживаема своим любимым мужем, Ева завалилась назад вместе с ним.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda segurando a mão de seu amado marido, Eva caiu para trás junto com ele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 繪羽被最愛的丈夫抱著，一起往後摔倒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 绘羽被最爱的丈夫抱着，一起往后摔倒。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ancora tenuta dal suo amato marito, Eva cadde all'indietro con lui.

Umineko Project (UP): "Honey......? Honey...?! HiiiIiiIIiiiIIIIIII!!!"

Russian (RU): "Дорогой? Дорогой?! И‐и‐и‐и‐и‐и‐и‐и‐и‐и!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Querido......? Querido...?! HiiiIiiIIiiiIIIIIII!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「老公……？老公…？！嗨咿咿咿咿咿咿咿咿咿咿咿咿！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Caro...? Caro...?! Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeekkkk!!!"

Umineko Project (UP): Eva screamed.

Russian (RU): Ева завопила.

Chinese Simplified (CN): …这也难免。

Steam (ST): The face she had been looking for...had been half lost, and the crushed skull, the mashed brains, and the crushed jaw all lay bare...
Umineko Project (UP): The face she had been looking for......had been half lost, and the crushed skull, the squelchy exposed brain, and the crushed jaw were all bare......
PC Japanese (JP): そこに求めたはずの秀吉の面影が、……半分失われていて、砕けた頭蓋骨、ぐちゃぐちゃになってはみ出た脳髄、砕けた歯茎を剥き出しにしているのだから……。
Russian (RU): Половина лица, на которое она глядела, была утеряна, и расколотый череп, каша из мозгов и переломанная челюсть были полностью оголены......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O rosto que ela estava olhando......estava pela metade, com seu crânio esmagado, seu queixo esmagado e seu cérebro exposto como polpa — todos completamente expostos......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟，本應在那的秀吉的面容，……沒了一半，頭蓋骨碎裂，腦髓粘糊糊地往外溢，破破爛爛的牙床暴露在了外面……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟，本应在那的秀吉的面容，……没了一半，头盖骨碎裂，脑髓粘糊糊地往外溢，破破烂烂的牙床暴露在了外面……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il volto che stava cercando... era andata perduta per metà, e il cranio distrutto, le cervella spappolate, e la mascella spaccata erano tutte scoperte...

Umineko Project (UP): "45, impact, on target...!"

Umineko Project (UP): "Spectacular. Fire again. Three remain."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「見事だ。続けて撃て。残りは３人であるぞ」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "F-Father...!! Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-What...what...is this supposed to be?!?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "F‐Father...!! W‐w‐w‐w‐w‐what, what...are you doing?!?!"

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「おッ、お父さん…！！　こここここッ、これはッ、何の真似です？！？！」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "P‐Pai...!! O‐O‐O‐O‐OO‐O que, o que...você está fazendo?!?!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「爸、爸爸…！！这这这这这、这到底，算什么意思？！？！」

Steam (ST): When Krauss stood up forcefully and was about to rush Kinzo, 00 blocked him.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss stood up forcefully, and was about to rush Kinzo, when 00 blocked him.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼が威勢良く立ち上がり、金蔵に食って掛かろうとすると、それを００に制止される。
Russian (RU): Когда Краусс тяжело встал и готов был броситься на Кинзо, 00 преградила ему путь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss permaneceu vigoroso, prestes a ir contra Kinzo quando 00 o bloqueou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼氣勢十足地站起，撲向金藏，不過被 00 給阻止了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼气势十足地站起，扑向金藏，不过被 00 给阻止了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando Krauss si alzò in piedi con forza, e stava per correre verso Kinzo, 00 lo bloccò.

Steam (ST): ...With her slender-looking body, she held back Krauss with just the palm of her right hand.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Despite her slender‐looking body, she held back Krauss's body with just the palm of her right hand.
PC Japanese (JP): ……華奢そうな体をしながら、右腕の手の平だけで蔵臼の体躯を押し留める。
Russian (RU): ......Её тело было по‐женски стройным и ненакачанным, но при этом она сдерживала Краусса всего лишь ладонью правой руки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Apesar de seu corpo de aparência delgada, ela conteve Krauss com apenas a palma de sua mão direita.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……明明身段纖細，但她僅靠右手手掌就阻擋住了藏臼的身軀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……明明身段纤细，但她仅靠右手手掌就阻挡住了藏臼的身躯。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Con il suo corpo dall'aspetto esile, lei trattenne il corpo di Krauss solamente col palmo della sua mano destra.

Steam (ST): He still tried to resist and attack Kinzo, so 00 lifted Krauss by the nape of the neck and twisted into his Adam's apple with her thumb.
Umineko Project (UP): He still tried to resist and attack Kinzo, so 00 lifted Krauss up by the collar, and twisted into his Adam's apple with her thumb.
PC Japanese (JP): それでもなお、抗い、金蔵に組みかかろうとするので、００は蔵臼の襟首を掴み上げ、親指を喉仏に捻りこむ。
Russian (RU): Тот всё равно попытался сопротивляться и напасть на Кинзо, поэтому 00 подняла Краусса за воротник и ввинтила тому свой большой палец в адамово яблоко.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele ainda tentou resistir e atacar Kinzo, por isso 00 o ergue pelo colarinho,torcendo seu pomo de adão com seu polegar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 由於藏臼還在反抗，意圖撲向金藏，所以 00 拎起了藏臼的領口，以拇指摁他的喉結。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 由于藏臼还在反抗，意图扑向金藏，所以 00 拎起了藏臼的领口，以拇指摁他的喉结。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lui provò a resistere e attaccare Kinzo, così 00 sollevò Krauss dalla nuca, e con il pollice ritorse il suo pomo d'Adamo.

Steam (ST): It seemed to be very painful, and Krauss was overcome with agony.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed to be very painful, and Krauss was overcome with agony.
PC Japanese (JP): それはとても堪えたらしく、蔵臼は悶絶して苦しがった。
Russian (RU): Это было очень больно, и Краусс задёргался в агонии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aparentava ser extremamente doloroso, e Krauss foi suprimido pela agonia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被這麼折磨是疼痛難當的吧，藏臼難受得都快昏過去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被这么折磨是疼痛难当的吧，藏臼难受得都快昏过去了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrò essere molto doloroso, e Krauss fu sopraffatto dall'agonia.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): 410 travou sua mira em Kyrie por um segundo.{n}Naquele segundo, ......Kyrie se preparou para a morte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 410 瞄了霧江一眼。{n}所以在那一瞬間，……霧江做好了死的覺悟。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 410 瞄了雾江一眼。{n}所以在那一瞬间，……雾江做好了死的觉悟。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): 410 guardò Kyrie per un secondo. In quel secondo... Kyrie si era preparata alla propria morte.

Steam (ST): But when she readied her golden bow in midair, 410 was looking at someone else over Kyrie's shoulder.
Umineko Project (UP): But once she had readied her golden bow in midair, 410 looked at someone else over Kyrie's shoulder.
PC Japanese (JP): だが宙に黄金の弓を構えた時、４１０は霧江の頭越しに別の誰かを見た。
Russian (RU): Но когда она взяла на изготовку свой золотой лук, 410 глядела на кого‐то за плечом Кирие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas assim que ela apontou seu arco dourado em meio ao ar, 410 olhou para alguém que estava além de Kyrie.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，在半空中拉開黃金之弓時，410 轉而望向了霧江腦袋後面的某人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，在半空中拉开黄金之弓时，410 转而望向了雾江脑袋后面的某人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma quando preparò il suo arco dorato a mezz'aria, 410 stava guardando qualcun altro da sopra la spalla di Kyrie.

Steam (ST): ...So, as imprudent as it was, Kyrie felt as though she had been saved...
Umineko Project (UP): ......So, as shameless as it was, Kyrie sensed that she had been saved......
PC Japanese (JP): ……だから霧江は不謹慎にも、自分は助かったと直感する……。
Russian (RU): ......Поэтому, как бы некрасиво это ни было, Кирие ощутила облегчение от того, что её миновала участь оказаться убитой...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Sem qualquer escrúpulo, Kyrie sentiu que ela havia sido salva......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……所以，雖說這麼想有點缺德，但霧江當即感覺，自己得救了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……所以，虽说这么想有点缺德，但雾江当即感觉，自己得救了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perciò, per quanto fosse imprudente, Kyrie si sentì come se fosse stata risparmiata...

Steam (ST): Again, an ugly, exploding, popping sound rang throughout the room.
Umineko Project (UP): Again, an ugly sound of something cracking and exploding rang throughout the room.
PC Japanese (JP): 再び、室内に砕けて爆ぜる醜い音が響き渡る。
Russian (RU): И вновь по комнате разнёсся уродливый лопающийся звук.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Novamente, um horrendo som de algo quebrando e explodindo ecoou pela sala.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 室內又一次響起了骨肉爆碎的醜惡之聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 室内又一次响起了骨肉爆碎的丑恶之声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ancora, un orribile suono di schiocco ed esplosione echeggiò nella stanza.

Steam (ST): ...Who was it this time?
Umineko Project (UP): ......Who was it this time?
PC Japanese (JP): ……今度は誰が？
Russian (RU): ......Кого же на этот раз?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Quem seria desta vez?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這次是誰？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这次是谁？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Chi era questa volta?

Steam (ST): When Kyrie turned to face the direction of the sound,
Umineko Project (UP): When Kyrie turned in the direction of the sound...
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江が音をした方向を振り返ると、
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 霧江は音がした方向に振り返ると、
Russian (RU): Когда Кирие повернула лицо в сторону звука...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando Kyrie se virou na direção de onde veio o som...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江尋聲轉頭望去，
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江寻声转头望去，
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando Kyrie si girò nella direzione del suono.

Steam (ST): ......she saw blood gushing like a fountain, and Eva lying on her husband's chest.
Umineko Project (UP): .........she saw Eva collapse onto her husband's chest, gushing blood like a fountain.
PC Japanese (JP): ………そこには、血を噴水のように迸らせながら、夫の胸元に倒れる絵羽の姿があった。
Russian (RU): Она увидела бьющую фонтаном кровь и Еву, лежащую на груди своего мужа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........ela viu Eva caída sobre o peito de seu marido, esguichando sangue como uma fonte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………在那裡的是，如噴泉般鮮血迸射的繪羽，倒在丈夫胸口上的身姿。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………在那里的是，如喷泉般鲜血迸射的绘羽，倒在丈夫胸口上的身姿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... vide sangue zampillare come una fontana, ed Eva che giaceva sul corpo del marito.

Steam (ST): ...Of course, her face had been half smashed just like her husband's...
Umineko Project (UP): ...Of course, her face was half smashed just like her husband's......
PC Japanese (JP): …もちろんその顔は、夫と同じく半分を砕かれたものだった……。
Russian (RU): ...И разумеется, половина её лица была также снесена, как и у мужа...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...É claro, seu rosto estava parcialmente esmagado, assim como o de seu marido......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …當然，她的臉也與丈夫一樣，被粉碎了一半……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …当然，她的脸也与丈夫一样，被粉碎了一半……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ovviamente, la sua faccia era mezza distrutta proprio come quella di suo marito...

Steam (ST): 410 had mercilessly targeted Eva as she'd clung to her husband's corpse, sobbing.
Umineko Project (UP): 410 had mercilessly targeted Eva as she clung to her husband's body, sobbing.
PC Japanese (JP): ４１０は無慈悲にも、夫の遺体にすがり付いて泣きじゃくっていた絵羽を標的としたのだ。
Russian (RU): 410 беспощадно нацелилась на Еву, пока та, всхлипывая, вцепилась в труп мужа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): 410 não teve misericórdia almejando Eva enquanto ela se agarrava ao corpo de seu marido e chorava.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 410 冷酷無情地把撲在丈夫遺體上號啕大哭的繪羽定為了目標。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 410 冷酷无情地把扑在丈夫遗体上号啕大哭的绘羽定为了目标。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): 410 aveva crudelmente bersagliato Eva mentre lei afferrava il corpo di suo marito singhiozzando.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "L-Let go of Nii-san...!! Let go of Nii-san...!! Just stop it, Father!! Just stop this brutality!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "L‐let go of Nii‐san...!! Let go of Nii‐san...!! Just stop it, Father!! Just stop this brutality!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「に、兄さんを離して…！！　兄さんを離しなさい…！！もう止めてお父様！！　こんな残酷なことはもう止めてッ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「に、兄さんを離して…！！　兄さんを離しなさい…！！　もう止めてお父様！！　こんな残酷なことはもう止めてッ！！」
Russian (RU): "О... отпусти нии‐сана! Отпусти его! Довольно, отец! Прекрати эту бойню!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "S‐Solte o nii‐san...!! Solte ele...!! Pare com isso, pai!! Pare com toda essa brutalidade!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「放、放開哥…！！放開哥…！！停手吧，爸！！快停止這種殘酷的行為！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「放、放开哥…！！放开哥…！！停手吧，爸！！快停止这种残酷的行为！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "L-Lascia andare Nii-san...!! Lascia andare Nii-san...!! Fermati, Padre!! {n}Ferma questa brutalità e basta!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "...Run away, Rosa... Ggh, ack......!"
Russian (RU): "......Беги, Роза... Гхх, акх!.."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Scappa via, Rosa... Ggh, ack...!"

Steam (ST): Rosa's objection didn't reach Kinzo as he continued to laugh loudly in the blood-spattered dining hall, and she wasn't able to lessen Krauss's pain at being lifted up by the nape of the neck by 00.
Umineko Project (UP): Rosa's protestations weren't reaching Kinzo as he continued to laugh loudly in the blood‐spattered dining hall, and nor was she able to lessen Krauss's pain as 00 lifted him up by the collar.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座の抗議は、血飛沫に染まる食堂で高笑いを続ける金蔵には届かないし、００に襟首を掴み上げられている蔵臼の苦痛を和らげることも出来ない。
Russian (RU): Громко хохочущий в перепачканном кровью обеденном зале Кинзо пропустил слова Розы мимо ушей, поэтому ему было не до того, чтобы облегчить боль Краусса, удерживаемого 00 за воротник.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os protestos de Rosa não eram capazes de alcançar Kinzo, que continuava a rir vigorosamente naquela sala de jantar pintada de sangue, e tampouco era capaz de amenizar a dor de Krauss, que era erguido pelo colarinho.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座的抗議傳不進在淋上鮮血的餐廳裡高聲大笑的金藏的耳中，無法緩解被 00 拎起領口的藏臼的痛苦。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座的抗议传不进在淋上鲜血的餐厅里高声大笑的金藏的耳中，无法缓解被 00 拎起领口的藏臼的痛苦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'obiezione di Rosa non raggiunse Kinzo mentre lui continuava a ridere forte nella sala da pranzo schizzata di sangue, quindi non fu capace di diminuire il dolore di Krauss sollevato per la nuca da 00.

Steam (ST): So, Rosa had no choice but to use force. She lifted up a chair beside her and gave a warning.
Umineko Project (UP): So Rosa had no choice but to use force. She raised one of the chairs beside her over her head, and gave a warning.
PC Japanese (JP): だから楼座は実力を行使するしかない。傍らの椅子を振り上げ、警告する。
Russian (RU): И тогда Розе осталось лишь прибегнуть к грубой силе. Она подняла стоящий рядом с ней стул и сделала предупреждение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso Rosa não tinha outra escolha senão usar a força. Ela levantou, acima de sua cabeça, uma das cadeiras de que estavam próximas, e deu um aviso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，樓座只能訴諸武力。高高揮起身旁的椅子，警告道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，楼座只能诉诸武力。高高挥起身旁的椅子，警告道。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi Rosa non aveva altra scelta che usare la forza. Sollevò la sedia di fianco a lei, e diede un avvertimento.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "Father...!! Order her to let go of Nii-san! Just stop them from doing this!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Father...!! Order her to let go of Nii‐san! Just make them stop all this!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お父様…！！　兄さんを離すように命令して！　もうこんなことを止めさせて！！」
Russian (RU): "Отец! Прикажи ей отпустить нии‐сана! Прикажи им прекратить это!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pai...!! Ordene‐a para soltar o nii‐san! Apenas pare com tudo isso!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「爸…！！快命令她放開哥！叫她們停手！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「爸…！！快命令她放开哥！叫她们停手！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Padre...!! Ordinale di lasciar andare Nii-san! Fermale da fare questo!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "I cannot. If that is what you desire, then prevent it using your own power. ...Cut a path through to your own fate with your own hands. You who have always hid behind the backs of others in fear, let me see you overcome your weakness one last time in your life...!! Fuhhahahahahahahahaha!!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "I think not. If that is what you desire, then prevent it using your own power. ......Cut a path open for your own fate with your own hands. You who have always hid behind the backs of others in fear, show me the final bit of self‐mastery that dwells within you...!! Fuhha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}haha!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「出来ぬな。それを望むならば、お前の自らの力で阻止するが良い。……自らの運命は自らの手で切り開け。常に誰かの背に隠れ、怯えてきたお前に宿る、人生最後の克己を見せてみよ…！！　ふっははははははははは！！！」
Russian (RU): "Не могу. Если хочешь такого, то прекрати это своими силами. ......Проложи борозду в своей судьбе своими собственными руками. Ты, что вечно в страхе пряталась за чужими спинами, яви мне последнюю частицу протеста, таящуюся в тебе! Фуха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха!!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Temo que não posso. Se este é o seu desejo, então evite isso usando sua própria força. ......Abra um caminho em seu destino com suas próprias mãos. Você sempre se escondeu atrás dos outros, sempre com medo, agora, mostre‐me o pouco de automaestria que ainda reside em você e como irá superar suas fraquezas finais...!! Fuhha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}haha!!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「沒門兒。你想要這樣的話，那就以你自身的力量來阻止好了。……以自己的手來開創自己的命運。讓我瞧瞧，宿在總是怯懦地躲在他人背後的你身上的，人生最後的克己吧…！！哇、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「没门儿。你想要这样的话，那就以你自身的力量来阻止好了。……以自己的手来开创自己的命运。让我瞧瞧，宿在总是怯懦地躲在他人背后的你身上的，人生最后的克己吧…！！哇、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non posso. Se questo è ciò che desideri, allora previenilo usando la tua forza. ... Creati un percorso nel tuo destino con le tue proprie mani. Tu che ti sei sempre nascosta dietro le spalle degli altri nella paura, mostrami alla fine il poco di abnegazione che dimora dentro te...!! Fuhhahahahahahahahaha!!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "...F-Father... ......Aaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhh!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お、……お父様……。………うわああああああああぁあああ！！」
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「爸、……爸爸……。………嗚哇啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「爸、……爸爸……。………呜哇啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "P... Padre... whaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhh!!!"

Steam (ST): The chair that Rosa had lifted up... ...swung down at the father who had reigned as a symbol of terror for her entire life.
Umineko Project (UP): The chair that Rosa had lifted up.........swung down at the father who had reigned as a symbol of terror for her entire life.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座はその振り上げた椅子を、………自分の生涯に、畏怖の対象として君臨し続けた父親に対し、振り下ろす。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 楼座はその振り上げた椅子を、………自分の生涯に、畏怖の対象として君臨し続けた父親に対し、振り下ろす。
Russian (RU): Поднятый Розой стул... стал опускаться на отца, всю жизнь являющегося для неё воплощением страха и ужаса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A cadeira que Rosa havia erguido.........foi jogada contra o pai que sempre reinou como símbolo de terror durante toda sua vida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座將揮起的椅子，………朝在自己的一生中，一直作為畏懼對象地君臨在自己之上的父親，砸了下去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座将挥起的椅子，………朝在自己的一生中，一直作为畏惧对象地君临在自己之上的父亲，砸了下去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sedia che Rosa aveva sollevato... venne brandita contro il Padre che aveva regnato come simbolo di terrore per l'intera vita di lei.

Steam (ST): It was the greatest...and final...act of bravery and self-control in Rosa's life.
Umineko Project (UP): It was the greatest, and final, act of bravery and self‐mastery in Rosa's life.
PC Japanese (JP): それは楼座の人生で最大の、そして最後の勇気、そして克己。
Russian (RU): Это был величайший... и последний акт смелости и неповиновения в жизни Розы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi o maior, e último ato de bravura e automaestria da vida de Rosa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是樓座人生中最大最後的勇氣，與克己。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是楼座人生中最大最后的勇气，与克己。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era il più grande, e ultimo... atto di coraggio e abnegazione nella vita di Rosa.

Steam (ST): What Kinzo had said might have been true.
Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo might have been right.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵の言う通りかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Сказанное Кинзо, скорее всего, оказалось правдой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kinzo poderia estar certo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 或許正如金藏所說吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 或许正如金藏所说吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quello che Kinzo aveva detto poteva essere vero.

Steam (ST): ...If she had grasped that courage much sooner, her life might have become more free, unrestrained by anyone else.
Umineko Project (UP): ......If she had grasped that courage much, much sooner, her life might have been more free, unrestrained by anyone else.
PC Japanese (JP): ……その勇気をもっともっと早くに持てたなら、彼女の人生はもっと自由で、何者にも束縛されなかったかもしれない。
Russian (RU): ......Если бы она только проявила смелость гораздо раньше, она могла быть жить свободной, ни кем и ни чем не сковываемой жизнью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Se ela tivesse alcançado essa coragem muito, muito antes, sua vida poderia ter sido muito mais livre, sem ser restringida por ninguém.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……要是能更早更早地把這勇氣拿出來，她的人生就會變得更加自由，不受任何人的束縛，也說不定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……要是能更早更早地把这勇气拿出来，她的人生就会变得更加自由，不受任何人的束缚，也说不定。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se lei avesse afferrato quel coraggio molto prima, la sua vita sarebbe potuta diventare più libera, senza restrizione da parte di alcuno.

Steam (ST): Then, there was a bursting sound.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, a loud bursting sound.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、バンッと爆ぜる音。
Russian (RU): А затем раздался разрывающийся звук.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, um estrondoso som foi ouvido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，“磅”的爆裂之音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，“磅”的爆裂之音。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, ci fu un suono esplosivo.

Steam (ST): The sound of Rosa's chair fiercely hitting Kinzo... could not have been this.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The sound of Rosa's chair fiercely hitting Kinzo, ...it was not.
PC Japanese (JP): ……楼座の椅子が激しく金蔵を打ち付ける音であるはずは、…なかった。
Russian (RU): ......Это не мог быть звук Розиного стула, которым она изо всех сил саданула Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O som da cadeira que Rosa havia arremessado colidindo fervorosamente contra Kinzo, ...não pôde ser ouvido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……樓座的椅子重重砸到金藏身上的聲音，…並未響起。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……楼座的椅子重重砸到金藏身上的声音，…并未响起。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il rumore della sedia di Rosa che colpiva duramente Kinzo... non poteva essere stato quello.

Steam (ST): With the chair still lifted up, ......she neatly lost half of her head...and slumped over.
Umineko Project (UP): Still lifting up the chair, .........she neatly lost half of her head, and fell with a thud.
PC Japanese (JP): 椅子を振り上げたまま、………頭部を綺麗に半分失い、ばたりと倒れる。
Russian (RU): С занесённым вверх стулом, она аккуратно лишилась полголовы и медленно повалилась на пол.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda com a cadeira erguida, .........ela perdeu metade de sua cabeça, e colidiu contra o chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 舉著椅子的樓座，………乾淨地丟掉了半個腦袋，撲通倒地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 举着椅子的楼座，………干净地丢掉了半个脑袋，扑通倒地。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con la sedia ancora sollevata... lei perse nitidamente parte della sua testa, e si accasciò.

Steam (ST): Still holding Krauss up with one hand, ...00 had stuck her other hand out towards Rosa.
Umineko Project (UP): While still holding Krauss up with one hand, ......00 had stuck her other hand out towards Rosa.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼を片手で掴み上げたまま、……００がもう片手を楼座に突き出していた。

Russian (RU): "Хм‐м. Значит, жертвами первых сумерек стали Ева, Рудольф, Роза, Нацухи, Хидэёши и Генджи. *хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "You lucky ones who have managed to escape the first twilight, allow me to introduce you to my friends. Arise, my friend! Ronove...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "You lucky ones who have managed to escape the first twilight, allow me to introduce you to my friends. Arise, my friend! Ronove...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 運良く第一の晩を逃れた者たちに、我が友人たちを紹介しようではないか。出でよ、我が友よ！　ロノウェ…！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「運良く第一の晩を逃れた者たちに、我が友人たちを紹介しようではないか。出でよ、我が友よ！　ロノウェ…！！」
Russian (RU): "Позвольте представить вам, счастливчикам, пережившим первые сумерки, моих друзей. Предстаньте, друзья мои! Ронове!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Permitam‐me apresentar a vocês, sortudos que conseguiram escapar do primeiro crepúsculo, meus amigos. Apareça, meu amigo! Ronove...!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「而对于有幸逃过第一晚的人们，就来介绍下吾之友人吧。出来吧，我的朋友！罗诺威…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Voi fortunati che siete riusciti a scappare al primo crepuscolo, permettetemi di introdurvi i miei amici. Sorgete, amici miei! Ronove...!!"

Steam (ST): When Kinzo called Ronove's name, the demon butler showed himself in midair, bowing respectfully...
Umineko Project (UP): When Kinzo called Ronove's name, the demon butler appeared out of thin air, bowing deeply and respectfully......
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵がロノウェの名を呼ぶと、うやうやしく最敬礼をしながら、虚空に悪魔の執事が姿を現す……。
Russian (RU): Когда Кинзо назвал имя Ронове, демон‐дворецкий возник перед ним из воздуха, с уважением поклонившись.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando Kinzo chiamò il nome di Ronove, il demone maggiordomo si mostrò a mezz'aria, inchinandosi rispettosamente...

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): "Pleased to meet you, everyone. And good day to those of you I haven't seen for a long time. Pu ku ku ku...! It seems this place is once again spectacularly untidy."
Umineko Project (UP): "It is a pleasure to meet you all. And to those of you for whom this is a long‐overdue reunion, good day. Pu ku ku ku...! It seems that we once again have a spectacular mess on our hands."
PC Japanese (JP): 「皆様方、初めまして。そしてご無沙汰の皆様におかれましては御機嫌よう。ぷっくっくっく…！　これはまた派手に散らかされましたようで。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「皆様方、初めまして。そしてご無沙汰の皆様におかれましては御機嫌よう。ぷっくっくっく…！　これはまた派手に散らかされましたようで」
Russian (RU): "Рад знакомству со всеми. Также приветствую тех, с кем давно не виделся. Пу‐ку‐ку! Как я погляжу, это место вновь так и молит об уборке."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É um prazer conhecê‐los. E àqueles de vocês para os quais esta é uma tão postergada reunião, um bom dia. Pu ku ku ku...! Parece que mais uma vez temos uma espetacular bagunça em nossas mãos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「各位，初次見面。另外，久違了的諸位，貴安。嗯哼哼哼…！這倒是又華麗地搞得一片狼藉呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「各位，初次见面。另外，久违了的诸位，贵安。嗯哼哼哼…！这倒是又华丽地搞得一片狼藉呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Piacere di incontrarvi, voi tutti. E buona giornata a chi di voi non ho visto da lungo tempo. Pu ku ku ku...! Sembra che questo posto sia ancora una volta spettacolarmente disordinato."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Pay it no mind. It takes a stimulant of this level to wake me from my daydream-like days." "Allow me to introduce my friend, a reliable butler and one of the 72 Great Demons, Ronove."
Umineko Project (UP): "I care not. This level of stimulus is necessary to wake me from my days of waking dreams. Allow me to introduce you. My friend, reliable butler, and one of the 72 Great Demons, Ronove."
PC Japanese (JP): 「良いわ。我が白昼夢の如き日々を覚ますには、この程度の刺激が必要だ。紹介しよう、我が友人であり、頼れる執事であり７２柱の大悪魔である、ロノウェだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「良いわ。我が白昼夢の如き日々を覚ますには、この程度の刺激が必要だ。紹介しよう、我が友人であり、頼れる執事であり７２柱の大悪魔である、ロノウェだ」
Russian (RU): "Что ж. Подобная стимуляция мне просто необходима, чтобы прогнать навеваемые днями грёзы. Представляю вам моего друга, надёжного дворецкого и одного из 72 великих демонов, Ронове."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu não poderia me importar menos. Este nível de estímulo é necessário para fazer com que eu acorde dos meus dias de devaneios. Permita‐me apresentá‐lo. Meu amigo, confiável mordomo, e um dos 72 Grandes Demônios, Ronove."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「無妨。要從吾那猶如白日夢的日子中醒來，這種程度的刺激是必須的。介紹一下，他是吾之友人，既是可靠的管家，也是 72 柱之大惡魔的，羅諾威。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「无妨。要从吾那犹如白日梦的日子中醒来，这种程度的刺激是必须的。介绍一下，他是吾之友人，既是可靠的管家，也是 72 柱之大恶魔的，罗诺威。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Molto bene. Questo livello di stimolo è necessario per svegliarmi dai miei giorni di illusione. Presenterò lui, mio amico, l'affidabile maggiordomo e uno dei 72 Grandi Demoni, Ronove."

Speaker: Ronove
Steam (ST): "I am pleased to make your acquaintance."
Umineko Project (UP): "I am pleased to make your acquaintance."
PC Japanese (JP): 「以後、お見知りおきを。」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「今后，还望各位记住在下。」

Umineko Project (UP): Just who was he aiming that introduction at?

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Para quem ele pretendia apresentá‐lo?

Umineko Project (UP): ......Krauss and Kyrie, who were still down on their backsides, and Nanjo, and Gohda, and Kumasawa...could only look up in shock at this middle‐aged gentleman who they had never met before......
PC Japanese (JP): ……尻餅を付いたままの蔵臼も霧江も、南條も郷田も熊沢も、呆然としながら初対面の中年紳士を見上げる他なかった……。
Russian (RU): ......Краусс и Кирие, всё ещё сидящие на полу, и Нанджо с Кумасавой и Годой могли лишь в шоке взирать на незнакомого им изящного мужчину средних лет...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Para Krauss e Kyrie, que ainda estavam no chão, ou para Nanjo, Gohda e Kumasawa...? Que apenas podiam olhar atônitos para aquele cavalheiro de meia‐idade que nunca antes havia encontrado......

Steam (ST): Only Shannon and Kanon seemed to recognize him, and they bowed deeply...
Umineko Project (UP): Only Shannon and Kanon seemed to recognize him, and they bowed deeply...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Apenas Shannon e Kanon pareciam reconhecê‐lo, e se curvaram profundamente...

Speaker: Ronove

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……我會幫您的。當然，等價的報酬照收不誤。……那麼？第一件工作是？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……我会帮您的。当然，等价的报酬照收不误。……那么？第一件工作是？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ti assisterò. Anche se ovviamente chiederò un prezzo adeguato. ... Quindi? Qual è il mio primo compito?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Capture the cowards who made it through the first twilight. Fortunately, there are still seven here, aren't there? Nanjo, Shannon, Kanon, Gohda, Kumasawa, Kyrie, and Krauss...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Capture the simpletons who made it through the first twilight. Fortunately, there are still seven here, aren't there? Nanjo, Shannon, Kanon, Gohda, Kumasawa, Kyrie, and Krauss...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「第一の晩を免れた間抜けどもを捕らえよ。幸いにも、ここにはまだ７人いるではないか。南條に紗音に嘉音、郷田に熊沢、霧江に蔵臼…！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「第一の晩を免れた間抜けどもを捕らえよ。幸いにも、ここにはまだ７人いるではないか。南條に紗音に嘉音、郷田に熊沢、霧江に蔵臼…！」
Russian (RU): "Поймай трусов, переживших первые сумерки. К счастью, здесь находится ещё семеро, не так ли? Нанджо, Шаннон, Канон, Года, Кумасава, Кирие и Краусс!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Capture os simplórios que sobreviveram ao primeiro crepúsculo. Felizmente, ainda há sete deles, correto? Nanjo, Shannon, Kanon, Gohda, Kumasawa, Kyrie e Krauss...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「把逃過第一晚的白痴們抓起來。幸運的是，這兒還有七人啊。南條、紗音、嘉音、鄉田、熊澤、霧江、藏臼…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「把逃过第一晚的白痴们抓起来。幸运的是，这儿还有七人啊。南条、纱音、嘉音、乡田、熊泽、雾江、藏臼…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Cattura i codardi che ce l'hanno fatta dopo il primo crepuscolo. Fortunatamente, ce ne sono ancora sette qui, no? Nanjo, Shannon, Kanon, Gohda, Kumasawa, Kyrie, e Krauss...!

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Hoh, if these seven are all offered as sacrifices, that's exactly 13 people! Until it's time for the second and later twilights to be carried out, throw them into the cage of sacrifices, *cackle*!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Hoh, if these seven are all offered as sacrifices, that's exactly thirteen people! Until it is time for the second and later twilights to be carried out, throw them into the cage of sacrifices, gehehehah!!"
PC Japanese (JP): ほぉ、この７人を丸々生贄に捧げればちょうど１３人だ！　第二の晩以降を実行するタイミングが訪れるまで、生贄の檻に放り込んでおくが良かろう、くっくっく！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ほぉ、この７人を丸々生贄に捧げればちょうど１３人だ！　第二の晩以降を実行するタイミングが訪れるまで、生贄の檻に放り込んでおくが良かろう、くっくっく！！」
Russian (RU): "Хо, если всех их принести в жертву, то наберётся как раз 13 человек! Пока не настало время вторых и далее сумерек, бросьте их в клетку для жертв, *хи‐хи*!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hoh, se esses setes forem oferecidos como sacrifícios, fecharia exatas treze pessoas! Enquanto não chega a hora do segundo crepúsculo e, consequentemente dos demais, jogue‐os na gaiola dos sacrifícios, gehehehah!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵，把這七人全獻祭了，就正好十三人！在是時候實行第二晚前，就先把他們扔進祭品之牢好了，呵呵呵！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵，把这七人全献祭了，就正好十三人！在是时候实行第二晚前，就先把他们扔进祭品之牢好了，呵呵呵！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Oh, se questi sette fossero tutti offerti come sacrifici, sarebbero esattamente 13 persone! Fino a quando non sarà il momento che vengano effettuati il secondo e i successivi crepuscoli, gettali nella gabbia dei sacrifici, *cackle*!!"

Speaker: Gaap
Steam (ST): "......A cashmere mop, huh? Understood."
Umineko Project (UP): "............A cashmere mop, I see. Understood."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………カシミアの雑巾掛けね。了解したわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………カシミアの雑巾掛けね。了解したわ」
Russian (RU): "............Кашемировая половая тряпка, значит. Поняла."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Um cachecol de casimira, é...? Entendido."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………成羊絨抹布了麼。明白了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………成羊绒抹布了么。明白了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Uno strofinaccio di cashmere, capisco. Ricevuto."

Steam (ST): As Gaap shrugged her shoulders, she looked at Krauss, who was still down on his butt.
Umineko Project (UP): As Gaap shrugged her shoulders, she looked at Krauss, who was still down on his butt.
PC Japanese (JP): ガァプは肩を竦めながら、未だに尻餅を付いたままの蔵臼を見る。
Russian (RU): Пожав плечами, Гаап взглянула на Краусса, всё ещё сидящего на заду.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Gaap deu de ombros, enquanto olhava para Krauss, que continuava sentado no chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 噶普聳了聳肩，望向了還坐在地上的藏臼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 噶普耸了耸肩，望向了还坐在地上的藏臼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come Gaap fece spallucce, guardò Krauss, che era ancora seduto sul sedere.

Steam (ST): She glared.
Umineko Project (UP): She glared.
PC Japanese (JP): 睨む。
Russian (RU): В её взгляде прибавилось злости.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela o encarou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 盯著他。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 盯着他。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Lanciò un'occhiata.

Steam (ST): Then, when she snapped her fingers, ...Krauss was swallowed up by the floor, as though a round pitfall had opened up beneath him.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, she snapped her fingers, ......and Krauss was swallowed up by the floor, as though a round pitfall had opened up there.
PC Japanese (JP): そして指をパチンと鳴らすと、……まるで床に丸く落とし穴でも開いたかのように、蔵臼が床に飲み込まれる。
Russian (RU): Затем она щёлкнула пальцами... И тут под Крауссом в полу возникла круглая яма, и пол словно проглотил его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então, estalou seus dedos, ......e Krauss foi engolido pelo chão, como se um alçapão redondo tivesse se aberto debaixo dele.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，她“啪”地打了個響指，……簡直就像是地上展開了一個圓圓的落穴一般，藏臼被地板所吞噬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，她“啪”地打了个响指，……简直就像是地上展开了一个圆圆的落穴一般，藏臼被地板所吞噬。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, quando schioccò le sue dita... come se una botola circolare si fosse aperta nel pavimento, da quest'ultimo Krauss fu inghiottito.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Uu, waaaaahhh......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「う、わああぁぁ………、」
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚、哇啊啊啊啊………、」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜、哇啊啊啊啊………、」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Uu, waaaaahhh..."

Speaker: Gaap
Steam (ST): "One down."
Umineko Project (UP): "One down."
PC Japanese (JP): 「一丁上がり。」
Russian (RU): "Один готов."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Um já caiu."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「搞定。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Uno in meno."

Steam (ST): There was no hole in the floor. But it had certainly looked as though Krauss had been swallowed up by a hole and disappeared...
Umineko Project (UP): There was no hole in the floor. But it had certainly looked as though Krauss had been swallowed up by a hole and disappeared......
PC Japanese (JP): 床に穴などない。しかし確かに蔵臼は穴に飲み込まれて消えたように見えた……。
Russian (RU): Дыра в полу исчезла. Однако со стороны всё определённо выглядело так, словно Краусс провалился в дыру и исчез...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não havia nenhum buraco no chão. Mas certamente pareceu como se Krauss tivesse sido sugado por um buraco e desaparecido......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 地上並沒有洞。但看起來，藏臼的確是掉進洞裡，消失不見了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 地上并没有洞。但看起来，藏臼的确是掉进洞里，消失不见了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non c'erano buchi nel pavimento. Ma sembrava certamente come se Krauss fosse stato inghiottito da un buco e sparito...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): Searching for her next prey, Gaap's gaze crossed Kyrie's. She snapped her fingers.
Umineko Project (UP): Searching for her next prey, Gaap's gaze crossed Kyrie's.{n}She snapped her fingers.
PC Japanese (JP): 次の獲物を狙い、ガァプの目線が霧江と交差する。パチンと指が鳴る。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 次の獲物を狙い、ガァプの目線が霧江と交差する。{n}パチンと指が鳴る。
Russian (RU): В поисках следующей добычи взгляд Гаап пересекся со взглядом Кирие.{n}Она вновь щёлкнула пальцами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Procurando por sua próxima presa, o olhar de Gaap de cruzou com o de Kyrie.{n}Ela estalou seus dedos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瞄準下一個獵物，噶普的視線與霧江交錯。{n}“啪”地一響指。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 瞄准下一个猎物，噶普的视线与雾江交错。{n}“啪”地一响指。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cercando la sua prossima preda, lo sguardo di Gaap incrociò quello di Kyrie. Schioccò le sue dita.

Steam (ST): Kyrie jumped back as though repelled.
Umineko Project (UP): Kyrie jumped back as though repelled.
PC Japanese (JP): 霧江は、弾かれたように床を飛び退く。
Russian (RU): Кирие отпрыгнула как ошпаренная.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kyrie saltou para trás como se tivesse rechaçado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 霧江如彈起來般地跳向身後。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 雾江如弹起来般地跳向身后。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kyrie saltò indietro come per repulsione.

Steam (ST): Her instincts had been right. After all, in the place where she'd been until a second ago, a round, jet-black hole had appeared, the same kind that had swallowed up Krauss.
Umineko Project (UP): Her instinct was correct. Because, in the place where she had been until a second ago, a round, jet‐black hole had appeared, the same kind that had swallowed up Krauss.
PC Japanese (JP): 直感は当たった。直前まで自分がいた場所に、蔵臼を飲み込んだのと同じ、丸い漆黒の落とし穴が現れたからだ。
Russian (RU): Она ощутила это инстинктивно. Поскольку на том месте, где она стояла секунду назад, возникла круглая, угольно‐чёрная дыра, вроде той, что поглотила Краусса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seus instintos estavam corretos. Porque, no local onde ela estava até um segundo atrás, um buraco negro surgiu, igual ao que havia engolido Krauss.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 直覺猜中了。這是因為，她剛剛所在之處，冒出了一個跟剛才吞下藏臼時一樣的，漆黑的圓洞。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 直觉猜中了。这是因为，她刚刚所在之处，冒出了一个跟刚才吞下藏臼时一样的，漆黑的圆洞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'aveva percepito istintivamente. Dato che, nel posto dove era stata fino ad un secondo fa, era apparso un nero buco circolare, lo stesso che aveva inghiottito Krauss.

Steam (ST): However, before she could catch her balance, another pitfall appeared and swallowed her up.
Umineko Project (UP): However, before she could catch her balance, another pitfall appeared and swallowed her up.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、姿勢を直す前に、さらに現れた落とし穴が彼女を飲み込んでしまった。
Russian (RU): Однако прежде чем ей удалось восстановить равновесие, возникла ещё одна дыра и поглотила её.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, antes que ela pudesse recuperar seu equilíbrio, outro buraco se abriu e a engoliu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，在她站穩之前，就又冒出了一個落穴，將其吞沒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，在她站稳之前，就又冒出了一个落穴，将其吞没。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, prima che potesse ritrovare l'equilibrio, ne comparve un altro e la inghiottì.

Steam (ST): ...Even Kyrie had no way of eluding Gaap's capture.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Even Kyrie had no way of eluding Gaap's capture.
PC Japanese (JP): ……いくら霧江でも、ガァプの捕縛から逃れる術はないのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Даже Кирие было не избежать оказаться пойманной Гаап.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Nem mesmo Kyrie era capaz de escapar das armadilhas de Gaap.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……縱使是霧江，也完全沒法逃過噶普的捕獲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……纵使是雾江，也完全没法逃过噶普的捕获。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Anche Kyrie non aveva modo di eludere la cattura di Gaap.

Speaker: Nanjo Terumasa
Steam (ST): "Waahh...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Uwaahhhhh......!!"
Russian (RU): "Оа‐а‐а‐а!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Waahh...!!"

Steam (ST): When she snapped her fingers again, a shocked Nanjo was swallowed up by the floor and disappeared.
Umineko Project (UP): Snap went her fingers once again, and a shocked Nanjo disappeared into the floor.
PC Japanese (JP): 再び指がパチンと鳴らされ、呆然としてた南條が床に飲み込まれて消えた。
Russian (RU): Когда она опять щёлкнула пальцами, пол проглотил шокированного доктора Нанджо, и тот исчез.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estalando seus dedos mais uma vez, e um Nanjo estupefato desapareceu para dentro do chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 響指聲再度響起，呆若木雞的南條被地板吞沒、消失。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 响指声再度响起，呆若木鸡的南条被地板吞没、消失。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando schioccò ancora le sue dita, uno scioccato Nanjo fu inghiottito dal pavimento e scomparve.

Steam (ST): When she did it again, 410 let out a short yell and jumped back.
Umineko Project (UP): Another snap of the fingers, and 410 let out a short yelp and jumped back.
PC Japanese (JP): さらに指が鳴らされると、４１０が、ひゃっと短い悲鳴を上げて飛び退く。
Russian (RU): Когда она сделала это в очередной раз, 410 коротко вскрикнула и отпрыгнула в сторону.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Outro estalar de dedos, e 410 deixou um leve chiado escapar e saltou para trás.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，又一個響指，410 邊發出一聲短促的驚叫，邊往身後跳去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，又一个响指，410 边发出一声短促的惊叫，边往身后跳去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando lo fece di nuovo, 410 lasciò andare un breve strillo e saltò indietro.

Steam (ST): This time, a slightly larger pitfall had opened, swallowing both Shannon and Kanon, who had been standing in a line by the door.
Umineko Project (UP): This time, a slightly larger pitfall had opened, taking in both Shannon and Kanon, who had been standing in a line by the door.
PC Japanese (JP): 今度は少し大きな落とし穴が開き、扉の脇に整列していた紗音と嘉音の二人を飲み込んだ。
Russian (RU): На этот раз открылось отверстие чуть большего размера, которое поглотило Шаннон с Каноном, стоящих в ряд у двери.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Dessa vez, uma cova de lobo superficialmente grande se abriu, levando Shannon e Kanon, que permaneciam alinhados próximo à porta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這次開了一個稍微有點大的落穴，吞下了整齊站在門邊的紗音與嘉音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这次开了一个稍微有点大的落穴，吞下了整齐站在门边的纱音与嘉音。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa volta, una botola leggermente più grande si era aperta, inghiottendo sia Shannon che Kanon, che erano in piedi in fila vicino alla porta.

Steam (ST): But because 410 had jumped away from the door, the way was no longer blocked.
Umineko Project (UP): But because 410 had jumped away from the door, the way was no longer blocked.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、４１０が扉の前を飛び退いたお陰で、退路が開かれた。
Russian (RU): Поскольку 410 отпрыгнула от двери, путь из комнаты оказался свободен.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas como 410 havia pulado e se distanciado da porta, o caminho já não estava mais bloqueado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，拜站在門前的 410 往後跳開所賜，退路大開。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，拜站在门前的 410 往后跳开所赐，退路大开。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma dato che 410 era saltata via dalla porta, la strada non era più bloccata.

Steam (ST): Instinctively aware that he would be next, Gohda dashed out through that door.
Umineko Project (UP): Instinctively aware that they would be next, Gohda dashed out through that door.
PC Japanese (JP): 次は自分たちの番だと直感した郷田がその扉から外へ飛び出す。
Russian (RU): Шестым чувством сообразив, как ему следует поступить, Года рванул сквозь ту дверь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Instintivamente ciente de que seria o próximo, Gohda correu pela porta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 憑直覺感到下一個會是自己的鄉田當即就從這扇門逃了出去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 凭直觉感到下一个会是自己的乡田当即就从这扇门逃了出去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Istintivamente conscio che sarebbe stato il prossimo, Gohda corse attraverso la porta.

Steam (ST): Of course, Kumasawa also escaped with lightning speed, chasing after Gohda.
Umineko Project (UP): Of course, Kumasawa too was hot on his heels, and ran off at lightning speed.
PC Japanese (JP): もちろん熊沢も、脱兎の如く逃げ出し、郷田の後を追う。
Russian (RU): Кумасава, разумеется, стрелой понеслась следом за ним.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro, Kumasawa também se apressou e saiu correndo em alta velocidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當然，熊澤也是疾如脫兔地逃走，隨鄉田而去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当然，熊泽也是疾如脱兔地逃走，随乡田而去了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ovviamente, anche Kumasawa scappò velocemente, inseguendo Gohda.

Steam (ST): As Gaap snapped her fingers over and over, round, jet-black pitfalls opened one after another behind them, chasing them.
Umineko Project (UP): As Gaap snapped her fingers over and over, round, jet‐black pitfalls opened one after another behind them, chasing them.
PC Japanese (JP): ガァプの指がパチンパチンパチンと数度鳴らされ、彼らの逃げるすぐ後を、丸い漆黒の落とし穴が次々開いて追い掛けた。
Russian (RU): Гаап, в свою очередь, несколько раз щёлкнула пальцами, и преследуя их, за ними одна за другой возникли чёрные дыры.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Conforme Gaap estalava seus dedos de novo e de novo, mais alçapões redondos e completamente negros se abriam um após o outro, perseguindo eles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 噶普“啪啪啪”地打了數個響指，地上冒出了一個又一個只差毫釐，緊追著他們的漆黑圓洞。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 噶普“啪啪啪”地打了数个响指，地上冒出了一个又一个只差毫厘，紧追着他们的漆黑圆洞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come Gaap schioccava le dita ancora e ancora, neri portali circolari si aprirono uno dopo l'altro dietro di loro, inseguendoli.

Steam (ST): However, they did nothing but drive the recklessly fleeing pair away...and couldn't swallow them up.
Umineko Project (UP): However, they did nothing but drive the desperately fleeing pair forward, and couldn't swallow them up.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、形振り構わずに逃げ出す二人を追い立てるに留まり、うまく飲み込むことは出来なかった。
Russian (RU): Однако те лишь подстегнули парочку прибавить ходу, поэтому не смогли поглотить их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, eles não tiverem nenhum efeito além conduzir adiante o par desesperado em fuga, e não foram capazes de engoli‐los.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，這只是在驅趕著不顧儀表地逃跑的他們，未能將兩人吞下。
